description:
She`s the new president of Isurugi Heavy Industries, and is Renji Isurugi`s daughter. Contrary to her gentle appearance, she does many things to promote war, so that her company will profit from it.
She took over Project TD, and protected it because she felt that they were needed as weapons. She secretly worked with the Shadow Mirror and Neue DC forces under the codename "Rose."
name: Mitsuko Isurugi
